an3.142:1.1: “Tayo ca, bhikkhave, bhadre assājānīye desessāmi tayo ca bhadre purisājānīye.
an3.142:1.2: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an3.142:1.3: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
an3.142:2.3: javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.142:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo bhadrā assājānīyā.
an3.142:3.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, tayo bhadrā purisājānīyā?
an3.142:3.3: javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.142:4.2: javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca?
an3.142:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an3.142:4.5: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṁ puṭṭho vissajjeti, no saṁsādeti.
an3.142:4.9: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhadro purisājānīyo javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.142:4.10: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo bhadrā purisājānīyā”ti.
